tool_description: Evaluates complete recipe concepts across multiple dimensions including feasibility, nutrition, appeal, and innovation to provide improvement recommendations.

target_audience.description: Intended audience: family, professional, beginner_cook, health_conscious, gourmet

skill_level.description: Required skill level: beginner, intermediate, advanced

innovation_factor.description: Level of culinary innovation: traditional, modern_twist, fusion, experimental

cost_level.description: Expected cost level: budget, moderate, premium

error_messages: Invalid target audience: Use one of [family, professional, beginner_cook, health_conscious, gourmet].
Invalid skill level: Use one of [beginner, intermediate, advanced].
Time values must be positive: Prep and cook times must be greater than 0.
Invalid innovation factor: Use one of [traditional, modern_twist, fusion, experimental].
Invalid cost level: Use one of [budget, moderate, premium].
Cooking method not recognized: Use standard culinary techniques.
usage: Provide complete recipe concept details including title, ingredients, methods, timing, and target parameters. The tool evaluates feasibility and provides scored feedback with improvement suggestions.

nutrition_score.description: Nutritional value and balance score from 0-10

strengths.description: Key strengths of the recipe concept

recommendations.description: Specific recommendations for enhancing the recipe concept
